alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 4:53PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lee County through 530 PM EDT... At 452 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Big Corkscrew Island, or 9 miles northeast of Bonita Springs, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Bonita Springs, Lehigh Acres, East Dunbar, Southwest Florida Airport, Harlem Heights, Iona, Cypress Lake, San Carlos Park, McGregor, Pine Manor, Lovers Key State Park, Olga, Buckingham, Villas, Three Oaks, St. James City, Page Park and Punta Rassa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
